description: Host monitoring dashboard with data from Prometheus sent by Node Exporter.

targets.expr: max by (instance, mountpoint) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"$node",mountpoint="/"}) - max by (instance, mountpoint) (node_filesystem_free_bytes{instance=~"$node",mountpoint="/"})

(max by (instance, mountpoint) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"$node",mountpoint="/"}) - max by (instance, mountpoint) (node_filesystem_free_bytes{instance=~"$node",mountpoint="/"})) / (max by (instance, mountpoint) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"$node",mountpoint="/"}))

panels.description: Uses external metrics from netdata ping -> InfluxDB.
panels.title: Internet Latency

list.description: Metrics rate for cumulative values such as Net and Disk I/O to calculate the correct rate. Should be the rate at which metrics are updated for the data source.
list.label: Rate
list.name: rate

title: OPNsense
